Posts.EditableText: I'm a DJ for http://www.redstaruk.net Tonight from 8pm UK Time, I'm going to try and break my listener record. Please tune in then and help me break it I play requests from rock to old school hip-hop, metal to indie and more. I do live voice broadcasting too, and I also do shout outs. http://www.redstaruk.net

Posts.EditableText:
Pandora.com is very good. The difference is, it chooses songs from a database, and it isn't live.

RedStarUK and Pandora are completely different.  I DJ live, and do voice broadcasting.  But I do recommend Pandora.com if you're looking for some new bands to listen to.

Posts.EditableText: I'm looking for a new station to do some DJing for at the moment.  I have left RSUK.
Posts.HTML: I'm looking for a new station to do some DJing for at the moment.  I have left RSUK.

Posts.EditableText:
I had to pull in my own listeners every show.  The site wasn't progressing as fast as I would like it to.  I'm a very very experienced DJ and musician, and I would much prefer to use my skills towards a larger crowd.

Hopefully I'll be back on air with a new station soon.
